data.name: root_modDescription
data.value: Allow to write text in-game to simulate stuff like boards or signs.

data.name: we_generalLib_exportFullList
data.value: Exportar la lista completa a la biblioteca

data.name: we_generalLib_importAdditive
data.value: Import adding all items into current list

data.name: we_roadEditor_verticalAlignmentBoxText
data.value: Vertical alignment relative to base line (0 = below with baseline; 1 = top with capital line)

data.name: we_roadEditor_verticalAlignmentLineText
data.value: Vertical alignment relative to the line when resizing (0 = below with baseline; 1 = top with capital line)

data.name: we_generalTextEditor_backfaceFontColorIsSameAsFrontFace
data.value: Use front face color in the back face

data.name: we_generalTextEditor_imageBordersLBRTlabel
data.value: Image relative borders (Left, Bottom, Right, Top - 0 to 1)

data.name: we_roadEditor_horizontalAlignmentBoxText
data.value: Horizontal alignment relative to line width (0 = left; 1 = right)

data.name: we_errorLoadingVehicleLayout_msg
data.value: Error loading the item {1}/{2} for a vehicle in the following scope: {2} Check the data shown below to get information.

data.name: we_vehicleEditor_pickOrSpawnAVehicle
data.value: Grab an unit of this vehicle as viewer, if exists

data.name: we_vehicleEditor_failedPickingAVehicle
data.value: There are no vehicles of this model running around this city. Try force spawning anywhere, like setting the model to a transport line.

data.name: we_settings_defaultFontDescription
data.value: The default fonts will be used when none is selected in a layout, when relative to Building, Vehicle or Placing on network modes; or can be selected as font class for the other fields below.

data.name: we_settings_defaultFontsAvailableOnlyWhenCityLoaded
data.value: Default fonts settings are available only when a city is loaded

data.name: we_textEditor_needPropSelectedWarning
data.value: Select a prop before editing texts!

data.name: we_buildingEditor_noParametersUsedThisInstance
data.value: No parameters were used in this instance.

data.name: we_buildingEditor_pickABuildingToEditParameters
data.value: Pick a building to edit its parameters.

data.name: we_buildingEditor_transportStation_platformSelectionInfo
data.value: The platform order will define which information show in texts of this prop. The priority order will be used to determine from where to get the lines passing thru this building, following the order below. The platforms in the top will have priority over others to get information like color, as example. The platforms are highlighted and numbered in the game. The underground platforms are shown above the main building also showing how deep they are being the lowest platform of them showed below all others. The underground platforms are inside [brackets].

data.name: we_buildingEditor_buildingIsNotTransportStation
data.value: This building is not a transport station.

data.name: we_generalTextEditor_useFixedIfMultiline
data.value: Use fixed color if multiple lines are found at platforms (instead of first of them)

data.name: we_generalTextEditor_bgFrontColorForMultilineIfActive
data.value: Mesh front color (if fixed color on multiple lines is active for the text)

data.name: we_generalTextEditor_bgRequiredForFrame
data.value: To generate frame, enable the background

data.name: we_textEditor_useAlsoForBg
data.value: Also illuminate the background Alpha from image will be mask for illumination cookie

data.name: we_settings_invalidLocaleCode
data.value: Invalid locale code! The {0} locale is being used instead!

data.name: we_Enum__VariableEnvironmentSubType_Clock
data.value: Clock as setted up in mod settings

data.name: we_Enum__VariableEnvironmentSubType_CustomFormattedDate
data.value: Date formatted as asked, works better when using the Real Time or alike mods

data.name: we_Enum__VariableEnvironmentSubType_Temperature
data.value: Temperature, using the game settings unit

data.name: we_Enum__ColoringSource_ContrastDistrict
data.value: Contrast from District Color (Custom Data only)

data.name: we_assetEditor_currentAssetIsNotBuilding
data.value: <color=yellow>Current editing asset is not a building!</color>

data.name: we_assetEditor_dontForgetSaveAlert
data.value: <color=yellow>Don't forget saving your layout before exit editor!</color>

data.name: we_errorLoadingVehicleLayout_msgSingle
data.value: Error loading the item for a vehicle in the following scope: {0} Check the data shown below to get information.

data.name: we_assetEditor_createLayoutAsset
data.value: Create new Layout in asset scope

data.name: we_generalTextEditor_assetEditorExibitionText
data.value: Content to show in Asset Editor

data.name: we_generalTextEditor_assetEditorPreviewSetText
data.value: Text to show in Asset Editor

data.name: we_generalTextEditor_goToAssetSpritesFolder
data.value: Go to WS asset images folder

data.name: we_general_errorsLoadingImagesFromAssetSpriteFolderHeader
data.value: Some errors occurred when trying to load the images from asset: <color=yellow>{0}</color>

data.name: WTS_ACTIVERULESONLY
data.value: Filter assets having at least one layout active

data.name: WTS_BUILDINGEDITOR_BUTTONROWACTION_COPYTOCITY
data.value: Clone this layout to be edited in this savegame

data.name: WTS_BUILDINGEDITOR_BUTTONROWACTION_DELETEFROMCITY
data.value: Delete from this savegame (Note: appdata or asset values will be used if exists)

data.name: WTS_BUILDINGEDITOR_BUTTONROWACTION_EXPORTASGLOBAL
data.value: Export this layout to local folder (Appdata)

data.name: WTS_BUILDINGEDITOR_BUTTONROWACTION_EXPORTTOASSETFOLDER
data.value: Export this layout to be packed to Steam Workshop

data.name: WTS_BUILDINGEDITOR_BUTTONROWACTION_NEWINCITY
data.value: Create new layout for this savegame

data.name: WTS_CLOCK_MINUTES_PRECISION
data.value: Precision (in minutes) Note that very low values are recommended only with Real Time mod or alike!

data.name: WTS_CLONE_180DEG_INVERT_TEXT_HOR_ALIGN
data.value: Invert text horizontal align on clone

data.name: WTS_CUSTOMSPRITE_ERRORHEADER
data.value: Some erros happened while trying to load custom sprites:

data.name: WTS_CUSTOMSPRITE_FAILEDREADIMAGE
data.value: An error has occurred loading image...

data.name: WTS_DEFAULT_VEHICLES_CONFIG_PATH_TITLE
data.value: Global vehicles text layout files folder

data.name: WTS_EXPORTDATA_NAMEASKING
data.value: Name of this rule to be saved:

data.name: WTS_EXPORTDATA_NAMEASKING_OVERWRITE
data.value: There's already a rule with this name. Overwrite?

data.name: WTS_EXTRA_SPRITES_PATH_TITLE
data.value: Extra sprites folder (max 400x400) to use in layouts

data.name: WTS_FONT_QUALITY
data.value: Font quality (high values may cause glitches)

data.name: WTS_INITIAL_TEXTURE_SIZE_FONT
data.value: Initial texture size (raise it only if you get undesired "black letters" when zooming in)

data.name: WTS_MAX_PARALLEL_WORD_PROCESSES
data.value: Max words being draw in background per font

data.name: WTS_ONNETEDITOR_INVALIDPARAMSETTINGS_DIFFERENTKINDSAMEPARAM
data.value: <color=#FF0000>Wrong settings in this parameter!</color> There are more than one text entry of different kind pointing to this parameter. Please check your layout settings.

data.name: WTS_PARAMVARS_DESC__COMMON_DATEFORMAT
data.value: Use "d" for day/date info, "M" for month info and "y" for year info. Other letters not allowed, but can use any symbol. Search by C# date formatting for more info.

data.name: WTS_PARAMVARS_DESC__COMMON_NUMBERFORMAT_FLOAT
data.value:
Use the decimal number formatting. Examples for the number <color=#FFFF00>1250.65</color>: <color=#FFFF00>0</color> => <color=#00FF00>1251</color> <color=#FFFF00>0.000</color> => <color=#00FF00>1250.650</color> <color=#FFFF00>#,##0.0</color> => <color=#00FF00>1,250.7</color>
Search by the C# number formatting reference for more details.

data.name: WTS_PARAMVARS_DESC__COMMON_NUMBERFORMAT_INT
data.value:
Use the integer number formatting. Examples for the number <color=#FFFF00>1251</color>: <color=#FFFF00>0</color> => <color=#00FF00>1251</color> <color=#FFFF00>X</color> => <color=#00FF00>4E3</color> (Hexadecimal) <color=#FFFF00>#,##0</color> => <color=#00FF00>1.251</color>
Search by the C# number formatting reference for more details.

data.name: WTS_PARAMVARS_DESC__COMMON_PARAMNUM
data.value: Set up the parameter that will be get the value.

data.name: WTS_PARAMVARS_DESC__COMMON_PREFIX
data.value: (OPTIONAL) Can be left in blank. A text to precede the variable value. Use the backslash to scape the slashes (<color=#FF00FF>/</color>).

data.name: WTS_PARAMVARS_DESC__COMMON_STRINGFORMAT
data.value: (OPTIONAL) Can be left in blank. <color=#FFFF00>U</color> Will make the text be transformed to all in uppercase <color=#FFFF00>L</color> Will make the text be transformed to all in lowercase <color=#FFFF00>A</color> Will apply abbreviations in the text

data.name: WTS_PARAMVARS_DESC__COMMON_SUFFIX
data.value: (OPTIONAL) Can be left in blank. A text to succeed the variable value. Use the backslash to scape the slashes (<color=#FF00FF>/</color>).

data.name: WTS_PARAMVARS_DESC__SegmentTarget__SelectReference
data.value:
Type a value between 0 and 4, and select in the list to continue.
<color=#FFFF00>0 to 4</color> means that the segments selected at reference tab will be used

data.name: WTS_PARAMVARS_DESC__VariableCitySubType_CityPopulation
data.value:
City population.
Select for formatting options.

data.name: WTS_PARAMVARS_DESC__VariableSegmentTargetSubType_Direction
data.value: Road direction - acronym in current language loaded in the mod. (English will be used as fallback)

data.name: WTS_PARAMVARS_DESC__VariableSegmentTargetSubType_District
data.value:
District name, or the outside connection city if at map edge. City name will be used as fallback.
TIP: Outside connection names may be customized using the <color=#00FF00>Addresses Mod</color>.

data.name: WTS_PARAMVARS_DESC__VariableSegmentTargetSubType_DistrictAreaKm2
data.value:
Current district size in square kilometers. City area size if not inside one.
Select for formatting options.

data.name: WTS_PARAMVARS_DESC__VariableSegmentTargetSubType_DistrictAreaM2
data.value:
Current district size in square meters. City area size if not inside one.
Select for formatting options.

data.name: WTS_PARAMVARS_DESC__VariableSegmentTargetSubType_DistrictAreaMi2
data.value:
Current district size in square miles. City area size if not inside one.
Select for formatting options.

data.name: WTS_PARAMVARS_DESC__VariableSegmentTargetSubType_DistrictOrPark
data.value:
District name, or the outside connection city if at map edge. If none available, the Sub-area name will be used if the segment inside one of them. City name will be used as fallback.
TIP: Outside connection names may be customized using the <color=#00FF00>Addresses Mod</color>.

data.name: WTS_PARAMVARS_DESC__VariableSegmentTargetSubType_DistrictPopulation
data.value:
District population. City population if not inside one.
Select for formatting options.

data.name: WTS_PARAMVARS_DESC__VariableSegmentTargetSubType_MileageKilometers
data.value:
Current mileage in kilometers.
Select for formatting options.

data.name: WTS_PARAMVARS_DESC__VariableSegmentTargetSubType_MileageMeters
data.value:
Current mileage in meters.
Select for formatting options.

data.name: WTS_PARAMVARS_DESC__VariableSegmentTargetSubType_MileageMiles
data.value:
Current mileage in miles.
Select for formatting options.

data.name: WTS_PARAMVARS_DESC__VariableSegmentTargetSubType_None
data.value: Select the data type to be extracted from the selected segment.

data.name: WTS_PARAMVARS_DESC__VariableSegmentTargetSubType_Park
data.value:
Sub-area name, or empty if not in one.
Sub-areas are called internally as "Park" because they were introduced at Parklife DLC, then after used by the Industries, Campus and Airport DLC without changing name.

data.name: WTS_PARAMVARS_DESC__VariableSegmentTargetSubType_ParkAreaKm2
data.value:
Sub-area size in square kilometers. 0 if not inside one.
Select for formatting options.

data.name: WTS_PARAMVARS_DESC__VariableSegmentTargetSubType_ParkAreaM2
data.value:
Sub-area size in square meters. 0 if not inside one.
Select for formatting options.

data.name: WTS_PARAMVARS_DESC__VariableSegmentTargetSubType_ParkAreaMi2
data.value:
Sub-area size in square miles. 0 if not inside one.
Select for formatting options.

data.name: WTS_PARAMVARS_DESC__VariableSegmentTargetSubType_ParkOrDistrict
data.value:
Sub-area name, then District/OutSide Connection/City name if none available.
Sub-areas are called internally as "Park" because they were introduced at Parklife DLC, then after used by the Industries, Campus and Airport DLC without changing name.
TIP: Outside connection names may be customized using the <color=#00FF00>Addresses Mod</color>.

data.name: WTS_PARAMVARS_DESC__VariableType_CurrentBuilding
data.value: Variables about current building (building layouts only)

data.name: WTS_PARAMVARS_DESC__VariableType_CurrentSegment
data.value: Variables about current segment. (on net and road nodes layouts only)

data.name: WTS_PARAMVARS_DESC__VariableType_CurrentVehicle
data.value: Variables about current vehicle (vehicle layouts only)

data.name: WTS_PARAMVARS_DESC__VariableType_Environment
data.value: City environment related variables, related to time, temperature and more.

data.name: WTS_PARAMVARS_DESC__VariableType_Parameter
data.value: Use an local variable of the instance at segment to determine its value (on segment only)

data.name: WTS_PARAMVARS_DESC__VariableType_SegmentTarget
data.value: Variables about referenced segments. (on net layouts only)

data.name: WTS_PARAMVARS_DESC__VariableType_VehicleBuilding
data.value: Variables relative to the source building where the vehicle went from

data.name: WTS_PARAMVARS_DESC__VarLevelRoot
data.value: Click once in an item to get information; Click twice to select.

data.name: WTS_PROPEDIT_CONFIGDELETE_MESSAGE
data.value: Are you sure that you want to delete "{0}"?

data.name: WTS_SEGMENTEDITOR_BUTTONROWACTION_LOCKCAMERASELECTION
data.value: Lock camera in the current selected item

data.name: WTS_SEGMENT_CLEARDATA_AYS
data.value: Are you sure you want to erase all items in the list?
